description:
The Keroro Platoon doesn`t seem to be noticeable enough to the Hinatas -- so they paint themselves in crazy Gundam model colors in order to become more noticeable.  Then Keroro has an invasion plan that involves turning human makeup crazy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Version Up Model / Keroro, the Make Up Used is the Self
ケロロ, バージョンアップモデル であります / ケロロ お化粧するは我にあり であります
